definition: lower form of animal life, including insects, insect larvae, worms and similar creatures/CL:條|条[tiao2],隻|只[zhi1]/(fig.) person with a particular undesirable characteristic
food preserved in sugar or honey
honey pot/fig. comfortable living conditions/privileged environment

sentences.english: Honey crystallizes if kept too long.
She licked the honey off the spoon.
They were visited by a large colony of ants which obtaind a sort of honey from them.
sentences.chinese: 一大群蚂蚁就来找它们，从它们那里可以得到某种蜜。

sentences.english: To love a women who scorns you is like licking honey from thorn .
sentences.chinese: 爱一个瞧不起你的女人无异于荆中舔蜜。

sentences.english: It carries the scent of honeysuckle, sweet as the lover's kiss.
sentences.chinese: 吐息轻携着忍冬的芬芳，香若爱侣的蜜吻。

sentences.english: Life is a flower, and love is the honey of the flower.
sentences.chinese: 人生是花，而爱便是花的蜜。

sentences.english: Tread down honey in the honeycomb.
As he begins to read the letter, Micaëla leaves.
sentences.chinese: 他开始读信时，蜜凯拉先行离开。

sentences.english: The technique parameters of removing satsuma mandarin segments membrane using enzyme were studied in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 研究利用酶制剂脱除温州蜜柑橘瓣囊衣的方法。

sentences.english: Make yourself all honey and the flies will devour you.
sentences.chinese: 把自己弄成全身蜜，蝇虫就会吞噬你。

sentences.english: If you have found honey, eat only enough for you, or else, having too much, you will vomit it.
sentences.chinese: 你得了蜜么？只可吃够而已，恐怕你过饱就呕吐出来。

sentences.english: Milk would flow in rivers, life would become as sweet as honey.
sentences.chinese: 牛奶会流成河，生活会像蜜一样甜。

sentences.english: Bush upright, twiggy , roots particularly susceptible to Armillaria.
sentences.chinese: 布什正派，枝状，根系特别容易蜜。

sentences.english: She brings a letter from José's mother, who lives in the country.
sentences.chinese: 蜜凯拉带来了贺塞在乡间的母亲的信。

sentences.english: Honeydew honey is relatively rare in the United States.
sentences.chinese: 相对于其它地方，美国的甘露蜜十分稀少。

sentences.english: The sweet-smelling nectar appeals to bees and other insects so they go to the plant.
sentences.chinese: 发出甜气味的蜜将蜜蜂和其它昆虫吸引到植物。

definition: pomelo (Citrus maxima or C. grandis)/shaddock/oriental grapefruit
powder/cosmetic face powder/food prepared from starch/noodles or pasta made from any kind of flour/whitewash/white/pink
